page.title: 06EMMA'S HOUSE IN BUSHEY
page.content: It has been made of brick, wood, tiles and slates and was built about 80 years ago.The house is semi-detatched. There are six rooms on the ground floor,a wide hall,a large comfortable sitting room, a dining room cum music room, a fully equipped kitchen leading to a breakfast room and a utility room containing washing machine, tumble dryer, boiler, freezer and dog box. There is also a small porch at the front of the house. Upstairs there are 4 good sized bedrooms, a bathroom and W.C.. There are 2 small spare rooms as well.An attic covers the top of the whole house _ 2 or 3 more rooms perhaps? There is a reasonable sized front garden,full of plants and shrubs and a large back garden with an out house attached to the house.The back garden is mature, well stocked with trees,shrubs, flower beds and a shed.
